author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bce, depositi o/n in calo a 682,746 mld, prestiti marginali a 56 mln | Mercati | Bond
text: FRANKFURT, Jan 31 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank reported the following daily data on liquidity provision, in millions of euros. TODAY PREV Use of overnight loan facility 56 65 Use of overnight deposit facility 682,746 688,803 For additional details click here For details of previous ECB overnight lending operations, see: here For data on ECB market operations please click For Reuters calculation of money market liquidity level please click . To see graph, right-click and select 'graph' option. (Reporting by Frankfurt newsroom)
